item.title: caffeine
item.description: #flashcards How does caffeine delay sleep?::It delays the binding of adenosine. The adenosine still builds up though, and once the caffeine in our body has been fully metabolized, the adenosine receptors are suddenly flooded and we experience the “crash”.

item.title: omega 3 fatty acids
item.description: Three kinds: ALA flaxseed oil, walnuts cannot be synthesized metabollically and must be directly obtained from diet EPA fish fish oil DHA fish fish oil
